meanings.definition: The process of introducing carbon into a solid iron or steel object to increase its carbon content.
meanings.sent1: During carburization, carbon is added to the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: Carburization is essential in making steel more durable.
meanings.sent3: The carburization of the steel turned it into a super-strong metal!
meanings.sent4: The carburization process is like giving the metal a power-up with carbon.
meanings.sent5: The blacksmith's skillful carburization transformed the iron into a mighty material.

meanings.definition: The act of treating a metal with carbon to improve its hardness and strength.
meanings.sent1: The carburization of the metal enhanced its toughness significantly.
meanings.sent2: Carburization is a common method to make metals more resilient.
meanings.sent3: The carburization of the metal made it as tough as a superhero!
meanings.sent4: Carburization is like giving the metal a strength boost with carbon.
meanings.sent5: The carburization process turned the metal into an unbreakable material.
